dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "legoas communs", "legoas Marinhas", and "milhas".
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation (deserts), mines, political boundaries, colonial possessions, coasts, islands surrounding continent.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
